programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: This time at Thornhill it is all about the newbies. With a national shortage of teachers and staff leaving the profession, can Mr Burton and his team encourage Josh to find the joy in the job and stick it out at Thornhill?

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil look back on their best transformations of single-storey living, from an unusual bungalow in Croydon to a dated, 70s-style bungalow in Larne.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Simon OBrien and Max McMurdo travel across the UK to find unique items lost in peoples homes to fix up for a profit. This episode features an old carpenters chest.

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: What terracotta treats have the Hamiltons got in store for Nigel and Hazel in Málaga? And in Alicante, the Rodriguez sisters hope to make Marias dream of Spanish living come true.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Can Tony and Lauren crack their Spanish villages mysterious past? In France, Claire and Jo demolish an old barn for future ventures. John and Tara leave no stone unturned.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: In Cumbria George meets Harry who wants to transplant a derelict Victorian railway signal box to his home and turn it into a garden summerhouse. In Derby, 22-year-old wood carver Sophie hopes to transform a VW campervan into a mobile home.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Craig Rowes helping Claire from Bedfordshire find a holiday home in the heart of Mallorcas capital, Palma. Claire has a budget of £190,000 and Craig has five great properties to show her.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Recently married Jean and Stuart Knight want to mark the next chapter of their lives by buying a holiday apartment together in Fuerteventura. For their budget of £60,000 Ben Hillman shows them five fantastic options.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Yeovil, Somerset, the first to host is 28-year-old PR manager Emmy Webster, who hopes to impress her guests with locally sourced produce and a main course of Somerset pork.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Disc jockey Steve Carpenter is second to host in Yeovil. A bon viveur, raconteur and quick wit, Steve hopes that sourcing the finest ingredients for his `country style cooking will secure him the £1000 prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Hosting the third dinner party in Yeovil is diminutive fork-lift driver Mel Dunford. With an exotic menu, including her own invention - duck vindaloo - Mel hopes to prove her doubters wrong.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the Yeovil area, tonights host is business owner and muscle man Alan Bunter. He hopes that his enthusiasm for all things Japanese will brush off on his guests and propel him into the lead.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Last to host in Yeovil is 50-year-old used car dealer Andy Neil. Hes supremely confident that his fine dining experience, along with the beautiful surroundings of his `amazing home will bag him the £1000 prize.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: After the high drama of stray hairs in drawers and grumbles about not having somewhere convenient to put a towel, the week draws to a close with payment day.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Karen and Brian are taking the leap and following their dream of making a permanent move to the Málaga province in southern Spain. Leah Charles-King shows them what their £120k can buy.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: The duo are back, helping more homeowners decide whether to stay put or start afresh. Is there still life in Carl and Katys draughty, efficient-less Victorian semi?

programme.title: George Clarkes Homes in the Wild
programme.desc: On New Zealands remote Rakino Island, George explores the off-grid enchantment of a one-of-a-kind home and a house so close to the ocean that the tide feels like a front doorstep.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Milky comes to AandE with possible life-changing injuries after a road crash. Shaun has had a bad parachute landing. And a six-year-old has an unknown object stuck in his throat.

programme.title: Social Media Monsters
programme.desc: Stories of serious crimes linked to social media. Fifteen-year-old Hollys accounts were hacked and inundated by her ex, in a campaign that culminated in a brutal killing.

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: Worlds Apart
programme.desc: Twelve strangers - young and old - take on an epic treasure hunt across Japan. Paired into intergenerational teams, wholl bridge the age gap and find the clues to win £50,000?

programme.title: Mitchell and Webb Are Not Helping
programme.desc: The real cause of climate change? Its good news and bad news. Plus: TVs most wholesome heirloom repair show. A death in the Sweary Aussie family. And the lawyers intervene in the writers room.

programme.title: Operation Daybreak
programme.desc: In 1942 Czechoslovakia, SS-General Reinhard Heydrich is appointed to become the Reich Protector of Bohemia and Moravia. The terror and oppression that follow cause Allied authorities in London to authorise a secret mission to kill the man who has come to be known as `The Butcher of Prague. The film explores shows the operation leading up to Heydrichs death as well as the massive German reprisals that followed it.

programme.title: Country Music by Ken Burns
programme.desc: After centuries of percolating in the American South, what was first called hillbilly music began to reach more people through the new technologies of phonographs and radio. The Carter Family, with their ballads and old hymns, and Jimmie Rodgers, with his combination of blues and yodelling, became its first big stars.

programme.title: Country Music by Ken Burns
programme.desc: During the Great Depression and World War Two, country music thrived and reached bigger audiences. Bob Wills adapted jazzs big band sound to create Texas Swing and Grand Ole Opry singer Roy Acuff became a national star. Despite a divorce between two of its members, the Carter Family carried on, turning out songs that went on to be classics. Nashville slowly became Music City and the centre of the growing country music industry.

programme.title: Glen Campbell: The Rhinestone Cowboy
programme.desc: In 2011 Glen Campbell announced he had been diagnosed with Alzheimers disease and that he would be bowing out with a final album and farewell tour across Britain and America. This new documentary tells Glen Campbells remarkable life story, from impoverished childhood in Arkansas through huge success first as a guitarist and then as a singer.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer

programme.title: Bargain Hunt

programme.desc: A fancy new radio station arrives at Great Slaughter, but the host is mysteriously murdered amid the broadcast.

Whilst in the region, Sonali meets a paddle-boarding campaigner helping to rid the area of plastic pollution.

programme.title: The Repair Shop

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: In South Wales, Nick and the team take on the task of transforming the home of Dan and his partner Anna, after a freak accident shattered their dreams of moving in together. After nearly a year in hospital, and now a wheelchair user, Dan desperately needs his terraced house to become a place where he can focus on his rehabilitation and his goal of walking again. Despite the teams tireless efforts, the house stubbornly fights back at every turn, pushing everyone to the limit.

programme.title: Have I Got News for You

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Professor Phillip Goodman devotes his life to exposing phony psychics and fraudulent supernatural shenanigans. His scepticism is soon put to the test when he receives news of three chilling and inexplicable cases: disturbing visions in an abandoned asylum, a car accident deep in the woods, and the spirit of an unborn child. Even scarier, each of the macabre stories seems to have a sinister connection to the professors own life.

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: A young British Jamaican filmmaker, Kwabena, struggles to navigate between his dreams and reality. As an independent creative, he struggles to survive in London and faces having to make sacrifices in pursuit of his dreams.

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: A young British Jamaican filmmaker, Kwabena, struggles to navigate between his dreams and reality. As an independent creative, he struggles to survive in London and faces having to make sacrifices in pursuit of his dreams.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: The presenters take the prospective buyers around to different houses in the country. The desire for more room, cleaner air and less noise drives city dwellers to seek an escape to the country.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Painting conservator Lucia Scalisi uses her skills to honour a racing legend, and a mechanical doll needs the expert skills of toy restorers Julie Tatchell and Amanda Middleditch.

programme.title: Michael Portillos 200 Years of the Rail
programme.desc: In this 200th year since the birth of the modern railway, train enthusiast and former politician Michael Portillo reveals how the first railways in Britain transformed the country.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Political Thinking with Nick Robinson
programme.desc: Nick Robinson has a conversation with, not an interrogation of, the people who shape our political thinking about what shaped theirs.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The eight finalists cook their fish courses to win a place on the menu of a banquet celebrating the Olympics and Paralympics. Champion weightlifter Emily Campbell, who won a silver in the Tokyo Olympics, joins the judging panel.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras
programme.desc: In Cape Verde, Gordon starts the adventure with a look at one of the worlds largest populations of nesting loggerhead turtles, before heading to the Bahamas with Caribbean reef sharks, California to see young elephant seals and the British Isles.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Today Flog It! comes from the Boconnoc estate in the Cornish countryside. Antiques experts Jonathan Pratt and Nick Hall uncover a pair of Georgian chairs and a childrens pedal fire engine.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Yinka Bokinni, Ellie Leach, Vicki Michelle and Peter Serafinowicz test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara gets all the backstage gossip and behind-the-scenes action ahead of the weekends Strictly Movie Special. Also, shes joined by a panel of celebrity super fans casting their eyes over the upcoming big screen dances as the couples rehearse on the ballroom floor for the first time.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Ben Robinson discovers the impressive lime kilns in Solva, Wales. This picturesque 19th-century port is famous for producing quicklime, a vital ingredient in both agriculture and the building industry. The kilns here are well preserved and contributed to making the soil in farmers fields more alkaline, which helped to increase crop yield at a time when the nations population was growing. Its a pretty spot now, but Ben learns how this industry would have made life tough for the locals.

programme.title: UEFA European Qualifiers Football LIVE
programme.sub-title: Group A: Northern Ireland v Slovakia
programme.desc: Stephen Watson presents full match coverage from Windsor Park as Northern Ireland host Slovakia in the World Cup qualifiers. After a battling away display against four-time World Cup winners Germany, and three vital points earned in Luxembourg last month, Michael ONeills side return to Belfast in front of their passionate and expectant home support.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul and Bob venture from London to the Scottish Highlands, taking a sleeper train overnight to their destination. They wake in the stunning vista of north west Scotland, where the pine forests and snow-topped mountains almost take their breath away.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: The Producers
programme.desc: A has-been theatrical producer and his accountant partner scheme to produce a play thats certain to flop.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Current affairs programme, featuring interviews and investigative reports on all aspects of life in Britain.

programme.title: Freddie Flintoffs Field of Dreams
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff attempts to create a brand new cricket team from an unlikely group of teens. He is determined to prove that anyone can play competitive cricket, whatever their background.

programme.title: Rob and Rylans Passage to India
programme.desc: Rob and Rylan are on the final leg of their Indian adventure. They discover an erotic temple, try mud wrestling for spiritual growth and go barefoot through Varanasi, Indias holiest city.

programme.title: Cracking the Case
programme.desc: A human torso dumped at a Salford beauty spot sparks a murder investigation. Police trawl CCTV looking for a suspect carrying something heavy and, as more body parts are discovered, the cops close in.

programme.desc: Its time to wake up, but Tinky Winky isnt feeling well. Soon after, Tinky Winky feels better, but now Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dont feel well.

programme.title: Tee and Mo

programme.title: Bing

Bings book is first, but when Coco tries to bring the Rainbow Fairy Mice into the story, Bing is frustrated, thats not how it goes! But Flop shows Bing how they can combine the two tales together.

programme.title: Colourblocks

programme.title: Hey Duggee

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Blueys Fathers Day card has to be perfect but she cant decide what to draw. Mum reminds her about all the fun times she has had with Dad.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Muffin cant stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop with Bluey and Bingo.

Lars and Xuli must work together to mount a rescue operation at the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing helps Flop do the shopping at Padgets shop but whilst Flop is paying, he finds a strawberry lolly that he cant resist putting in his pocket. When Flop sees Bing licking the lolly on the way home, they have to decide what to do.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say peas and go on a whirlwind word adventure. See peas on a plate, peas in a pod and even a pea flying! Peas can be little, yummy and frozen.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch

Some people say that a bakewell tart recipe comes from the Midlands, so Orsons version should be very good. Lets hope his friends like it too! He is using lots of delicious ingredients like raspberry jam and flaked almonds but is really hoping that his friends will like the lemony taste of the tart, as this is his special ingredient.

programme.desc: Freddie finds out all about creatures that live on land and underwater - newts. Chantelle is at a zoo to meet Kira and two very special salamanders while Rory and his son Sandy are at a country park to meet a very special protected newt.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Civil engineer Mimi shows how she keeps buildings safe by using her clever calliper to measure any cracks.

She asks Jud to be a pretend dentist and give Olivers teeth a check-over, but how many teeth does he have? Jud, Oliver and Jessica are then given the chance to practise their brushing skills with Karen. She gives them some top tips to make sure they always have gleaming white smiles. Solomon is in the dental surgery role play area.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines

programme.title: Wonderblocks

programme.title: Colourblocks

programme.desc: When Andy inadvertently loses some kapok tree seeds that Mr Hammond was hoping to plant in the chimp enclosure, its up to Andy to jet off to Africa in his safari-mobile and track down some more. Shrinking down to the size of a baby chimp, he embarks on an epic adventure, swinging through the trees in search of replacement kapok seeds.

The Brooklyn-Bells try to coax him back, but he refuses to return. Doug decides to make a mini swimming pool by filling the ball pit with cool water. Waffle loves swimming pools.

programme.desc: Frasier, jealous over Niles job as an art critic, schemes to get the same position at the radio station.

programme.desc: Jeff Platt, president and CEO of entertainment and fitness business Sky Zone, a chain of indoor trampoline parks, goes undercover in his own company posing as a contestant on a reality TV competition who is trying to win an action-adventure holiday.

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A familys renovated French gite springs several leaks. In Spain, back-to-back BandB bookings and a busy bar leave a couple run off their feet. Lesley hopes a coach trip to a tomato throwing festival will prove fruitful for her Spanish tour company.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Simon OBrien and Max McMurdo travel across the UK to find unique items lost in peoples homes to fix up for a profit. This episode features part of a tornado jet.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Maggie Aderin-Pocock in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Karen and Brian are taking the leap and following their dream of making a permanent move to the Málaga province in southern Spain. Leah Charles-King shows them what their £120k can buy.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: In France, after three years of hard work, Lolly and Sean dig deep to finish their once-abandoned manoir, while an army of workers battle to restore Dans fire-damaged château. Jonas and Ulrike aim to resurrect Romanias oldest Saxon era churches.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Two hosts decide upon an all-guns-blazing approach to payment day, knowing well that they have vastly underpaid everyone. With allegations of game playing, it is quite the tension-filled affair.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Bristol, can Georges restaurant standard food and cheeky menu floor his guests and bag him the grand?

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Alicante, Damon and Sophie help Sheffield sparky Mark get close to the coast. Meanwhile, away from the office, Manuel embarks on a quest for the perfect ham sandwich.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Alison Hammond, Jonathan Ross and Joe Thomas digest Pastry Week. Whose Technical got pied, and whose Signature plaits had the judges tongue-tied?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britains sharpest armchair critics share more of their sharp, insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional critiques of the weeks biggest and best shows on television.

programme.title: Mitchell and Webb Are Not Helping
programme.desc: The real cause of climate change? Its good news and bad news. Plus: TVs most wholesome heirloom repair show. A death in the Sweary Aussie family. And the lawyers intervene in the writers room.

programme.title: Greg Davies: The Back of My Mums Head
programme.desc: Stung by his mothers suggestion that he is not normal, Greg puts everyone else under the microscope in a petty quest to discover if anyone actually is.

programme.title: Sarah Millican: Thoroughly Modern Millican Live
programme.desc: Award-winning `Queen of Comedy, Sarah Millican presents her live stand-up show recorded at the Hammersmith Apollo, London. Sarah tells gag-packed anecdotes about lifes humdrum curiosities. Ever wondered how to make a homemade treadmill, or the reasons for carrying spare pants and the practicalities of an orgy?

programme.title: Crush
programme.desc: When a young artist is forced to join her high school track team, she uses it as a chance to pursue the girl for whom shes been harbouring a crush. But she finds herself falling for an unexpected teammate and discovering what real love feels like.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay heads to Cranbury, N.J., to help two friends who bought a French Bistro they used to work in; a disgusting discovery in a kitchen cooler forces Ramsay to shut the restaurant down on the busiest night of the year.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George travels to Macclesfield to visit a first time builder who hopes to transform an allotment shed into a Doctor Who-style, multi-functional play den.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Cheltenham, the first to host is 46-year-old Belgian-born hotel consultant Oli Delaunoy. Oli plans to wow his guests with his posh scallop starter and meaty main, but its his loud and vivacious personality hes banking on.

programme.title: Bumm Bumm Bole
programme.desc: Pinu loses his sisters shoes, so they both decide to share a pair until their father has enough money.

programme.title: Chote Sarkar
programme.desc: Amar, a businessman, is framed by two undercover police officers, Seema and Jagmohan, for the murder of his uncle. He then pretends to be mentally unstable. How will the drama unfold?

programme.title: Professor
programme.desc: Sita devi is a very strict aunt for a number of young ladies, and does not allow them to fraternise with males. Along comes Pritam disguised as an elderly Professor Khanna to break every possible rule of the aunt.

programme.title: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with her fiances brother after inviting him to return home.

programme.title: Vaada Raha...I Promise
programme.desc: A successful doctor gets into a car accident which leaves him paralysed from the neck down, and is subsequently abandoned by his fiance, making him lose all will to live.

programme.title: Dostana
programme.desc: Two straight guys pretend to be a gay couple to secure a posh Miami apartment, but both of them fall for their gorgeous room-mate Neha.

programme.title: Vikram Vedha
programme.desc: A tough police officer sets out on a mission to track down and eliminate a gangster with a reputation as legendary as his own.

programme.title: Dus
programme.desc: Terrorists are planning a major strike in Canada that may endanger 25,000 lives during the month of May.

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: When the body of a powerful businesswoman disappears from the morgue, the inspector in charge hunts for the truth. But when he questions her husband he realises that there is much more to the case than meets the eye.

programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Phone Number

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: When their African American neighbours car is egged, Vanessa goes against Mikes advice and decides to let them know their car wasnt the only one vandalized.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert moves into Rays basement office so he and Amy can have some private time.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra prepare Ally for her first play date and reflect back on their own first meeting and kiss.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra gets upset after seeing Rays reaction to her friends breast enhancement operation.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra have an argument about their new can opener, and Marie, Frank and Robert cant help getting involved.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike tries to minimize his time with his mother and stepfather when they come to visit, until they get snowed in at City Hall.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Michael learns his new girlfriend moonlights as a stripper, and Claudia catches Paul lying while Nikki plays head games with Stuart.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The mayors new sign language interpreter offends the deaf community, prompting Michael to appease one of its leaders.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike struggles when his ex-girlfriend who wants to mother his child and the mayor manages to break up a band.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
programme.desc: Monicas first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang goes horribly wrong when they all get locked on the roof after watching a giant runaway balloon from the New York Thanksgiving parade. Elsewhere, Joey wins his first modelling gig as the poster boy for a venereal disease campaign, and Ross competes with his ex-wife to communicate with their unborn baby.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: As New Year approaches, the gang make a pact to celebrate at Monica and Rachels flat without bringing any dates. However, as the New Year gets closer, all of them find themselves breaking that promise except for Ross, who brings along his new pet monkey Marcel.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers flamboyant mother visits New York, while Phoebe and Monica flirt with a handsome stranger while crossing a road and end up causing a traffic accident.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnes
programme.desc: Rachels Italian boyfriend tries to seduce Phoebe, Rachel accidentally reveals a secret to Ross, and Monicas aunt refuses to take the lasagnes she ordered.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler sees Rachel nude, and Joey learns that his father is having an affair.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Candy Hearts
programme.desc: Its Valentines Day and, out on his first date in nine years, Ross meets up with his ex-wife. Meanwhile, Monica, Phoebe and Rachel rebel against the spirit of the day by burning mementos of past relationships.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Stoned Guy
programme.desc: The owner of a fancy restaurant where Monica applies for the chefs position is a little high on illicit substances when he tries the gourmet feast she prepares for him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe doesnt get on with her identical twin Ursula. Unfortunately, no one can tell them apart, which leads to a few cases of mistaken identity, not least for Joey who is quite taken with Ursula.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After weeks of procrastinating, Rachel finally takes down the Christmas lights, but sprains her ankle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Poker
programme.desc: When the girls lose money to the guys in a poker match they seek out Monicas Aunt Iris, a famous card player, for lessons in poker and demand a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
programme.desc: Rachel accidentally lets Ross pet monkey escape, and the friends form a search party. She is then horrified to learn that her former best friend is engaged to marry her ex-fiance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Evil Orthodontist
programme.desc: Rachel gets back together with her ex-fiance Barry, even though hes engaged to her best friend Mindy. Meanwhile, Chandler agonises over a wonderful woman who fails to call him after their first date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fake Monica
programme.desc: Someone is pretending to be Monica, using her credit card numbers and having the sort of fun that Monica wishes she could have.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ick Factor
programme.desc: Monica discovers that shes developed a highly mature approach to her latest love affair, and Ross finds out that hes being mistaken for a male prostitute.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Carol gives birth, Ross and Susan almost miss the event when Phoebe accidentally locks them in a cupboard together to put a stop to their constant bickering. Meanwhile, Joey befriends an unmarried pregnant woman and ends up helping her to give birth.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
programme.desc: Ross has been in love with Rachel since ninth grade but has always kept it a secret. Now the truth accidentally comes out, but as Rachel rushes to the airport to greet Ross on his return from a business trip, she discovers that work is not all hes been getting up to while hes been away.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert moves into Rays basement office so he and Amy can have some private time.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra prepare Ally for her first play date and reflect back on their own first meeting and kiss.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra gets upset after seeing Rays reaction to her friends breast enhancement operation.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra have an argument about their new can opener, and Marie, Frank and Robert cant help getting involved.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike tries to minimize his time with his mother and stepfather when they come to visit, until they get snowed in at City Hall.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Michael learns his new girlfriend moonlights as a stripper, and Claudia catches Paul lying while Nikki plays head games with Stuart.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The mayors new sign language interpreter offends the deaf community, prompting Michael to appease one of its leaders.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike struggles when his ex-girlfriend who wants to mother his child and the mayor manages to break up a band.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
programme.desc: Monicas first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang goes horribly wrong when they all get locked on the roof after watching a giant runaway balloon from the New York Thanksgiving parade. Elsewhere, Joey wins his first modelling gig as the poster boy for a venereal disease campaign, and Ross competes with his ex-wife to communicate with their unborn baby.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: As New Year approaches, the gang make a pact to celebrate at Monica and Rachels flat without bringing any dates. However, as the New Year gets closer, all of them find themselves breaking that promise except for Ross, who brings along his new pet monkey Marcel.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers flamboyant mother visits New York, while Phoebe and Monica flirt with a handsome stranger while crossing a road and end up causing a traffic accident.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnes
programme.desc: Rachels Italian boyfriend tries to seduce Phoebe, Rachel accidentally reveals a secret to Ross, and Monicas aunt refuses to take the lasagnes she ordered.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler sees Rachel nude, and Joey learns that his father is having an affair.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Candy Hearts
programme.desc: Its Valentines Day and, out on his first date in nine years, Ross meets up with his ex-wife. Meanwhile, Monica, Phoebe and Rachel rebel against the spirit of the day by burning mementos of past relationships.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Stoned Guy
programme.desc: The owner of a fancy restaurant where Monica applies for the chefs position is a little high on illicit substances when he tries the gourmet feast she prepares for him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe doesnt get on with her identical twin Ursula. Unfortunately, no one can tell them apart, which leads to a few cases of mistaken identity, not least for Joey who is quite taken with Ursula.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After weeks of procrastinating, Rachel finally takes down the Christmas lights, but sprains her ankle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Poker
programme.desc: When the girls lose money to the guys in a poker match they seek out Monicas Aunt Iris, a famous card player, for lessons in poker and demand a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
programme.desc: Rachel accidentally lets Ross pet monkey escape, and the friends form a search party. She is then horrified to learn that her former best friend is engaged to marry her ex-fiance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Evil Orthodontist
programme.desc: Rachel gets back together with her ex-fiance Barry, even though hes engaged to her best friend Mindy. Meanwhile, Chandler agonises over a wonderful woman who fails to call him after their first date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fake Monica
programme.desc: Someone is pretending to be Monica, using her credit card numbers and having the sort of fun that Monica wishes she could have.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ick Factor
programme.desc: Monica discovers that shes developed a highly mature approach to her latest love affair, and Ross finds out that hes being mistaken for a male prostitute.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Carol gives birth, Ross and Susan almost miss the event when Phoebe accidentally locks them in a cupboard together to put a stop to their constant bickering. Meanwhile, Joey befriends an unmarried pregnant woman and ends up helping her to give birth.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
programme.desc: Ross has been in love with Rachel since ninth grade but has always kept it a secret. Now the truth accidentally comes out, but as Rachel rushes to the airport to greet Ross on his return from a business trip, she discovers that work is not all hes been getting up to while hes been away.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Michael McIntyre presents from the Theatre Royal, Drury Lane, where pop superstar Cheryl plays Send to All, singer Peter Andre gets a shock when woken for The Celebrity Midnight Gameshow, and there is also music from George Ezra.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri
programme.desc: ...Internet. Host Iain Stirling is joined by Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri for a scathing takedown of pure internet madness, from awkward influencers to social media fails. (S1, E06)

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Beavis and Butt-Head try to donate sperm at a regular bank; Beavis and Butt-Head invent a new Burger World menu item that will make them rich.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Host Jimmy Carr and team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson return for a new series of `8 Out of 10 Cats. Jimmy once again oversees the disputes and deliberations on the topical events that set the nations chins wagging as Jon and Sean are joined by Joe Wilkinson, Ellie Taylor, Natalie Cassidy and Gabby Logan.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.desc: Chaos ensues when Leonards recently divorced parents and Sheldons devoutly religious mother come to town. Meanwhile, Howard and Raj think the government is out to get them when theyre contacted about their guidance system.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The group of friends struggle through an awkward morning after Sheldons mother and Leonards father share an evening together. Pennys family arrives in town to attend Penny and Leonards second wedding ceremony.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard has a meeting with Colonel Williams, a representative from the Air Force Department of Material Command, about the gyroscope he invented with Howard and Sheldon. Penny accidentally reveals that Bernadette is pregnant to their colleagues.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer agrees to let Fat Tony shoot a porn film in his home as compensation for football gambling debts. He sends the family for a July afternoon at Santas Village, but when they return ahead of schedule, Marge blows her top and storms out leaving Homer to watch the children. At a rest stop, Marge befriends an attractive marine biologist who tells her that Homer will never appreciate her if she continues to run back to him.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Girl Who Slept Too Little
programme.desc: Springfields graveyard is moved to right outside Lisas bedroom window. Terrified, she decides to confront her fears and spend a night in the cemetery.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Moe gets into an internet relationship with a woman named Maya. The two meet face to face and Moe is shocked to find that Maya is only three feet tall.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Some very familiar faces swing by when Futurama favourites Bender and co travel back in time to stop the Simpsons from destroying the future.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: First into the restaurant is 36-year-old, larger-than-life stand-up comedian Mani. His match is 30-year-old nursing home owner Natasha, whose quick wit and dry sense of humour are sure to give Mani a run for his money.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: An ancient Japanese clan teaches Snake Eyes the ways of the ninja warrior after he saves the life of their heir apparent. However, when secrets from Snake Eyes past are revealed, his honour and allegiance get tested.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Cleaning business owner Skyla hopes to find that sparkly someone who can give her nooks and crannies a good tickle. Bisexual trans man Zeus is only just dipping his toe into the dating scene and is looking for someone to go on his journey with him.

programme.title: Naked Attraction

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: With a dog named Lulu by his side, Army Ranger Briggs races down the Pacific Coast to make it to a soldiers funeral on time. Along the way, Briggs and Lulu drive each other completely crazy, break a handful of laws and narrowly evade death.

programme.title: Dejà Vu
programme.desc: Dejà vu is what unexpectedly guides agent Doug Carlin through an investigation into a crime. After an explosion in New Orleans, Doug is called to check and recover the evidence, but Carlins enquiries uncover a connection between the bomb accelerant and the body of a local girl named Claire Kuchever. Things become even stranger when Doug hears his own voice on Claires answering machine.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Gripping revenge thriller in which a CIA assassin turned bodyguard teams up with a crusading journalist to take on a Mexican kidnapping ring which targets young girls with the connivance of a brutal and corrupt police force.

programme.title: Hush

When the two stop at a service station, Beth goes missing and a terrified Zakes races to track her down, fearing she has become the drivers next victim.

After crashing on an unknown planet, two survivors quickly discover theyre actually stranded on Earth, 65 million years ago. With only one chance at a rescue, they must make their way across an unknown terrain riddled with prehistoric creatures.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: Haunting tale which centres on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from heaven. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by Galton Blackiston, his pal and a top-class, Michelin-starred chef. They don diving suits to swim with seals, and hire an unusual mode of transport to take them around the islands. Galton visits a sea salt farm and delivers some back to James, who uses it to cook up some wonderful salt-baked sea bass. James finds an unusual restaurant situated in the middle of a post office, and finishes off the day cooking roast duck by a stunning seashore.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James returns to one of his favourite places in the UK: the beautiful county of Cornwall. Joining him is his close pal and Michelin-starred chef Galton Blackiston. During their trip they discover some world-class Cornish ice cream, and Galton visits Newlyn fish market to pick up some Cornish cod. James cooks the cod along with Cornish oysters and a warm tartare sauce. They both round off the day with a painting challenge on Sennen beach, where they try out their oil painting skills.

programme.title: Secrets of the Curry Kitchen

programme.title: Nadiyas Simple Spices

programme.title: Nadiyas Simple Spices
programme.desc: Nadiya Hussain serves up deliciously treaty meals to rival any takeaway. These four flavour packed dishes - a smoky aubergine pizza, a spicy spin on egg fried rice, a speedy chicken jalfrezi and kulfi ice cream biscuit bars.

programme.title: Nadiyas Simple Spices
programme.desc: Nadiya shares family favourites perfect for any occasion: an authentic chicken curry infused with aromatic whole spices that has been passed down the generations of Nadiyas family, a cumin and dill-laced samosa, a quick, delicious tangy tomato prawn dish, and her sons favourite cake, a sweet cardamom traybake. And food writer Ping Coombes shares her passion for passing down the flavours of her ancestral cooking to her family, with star anise taking a starring role.

programme.title: Nadiyas Simple Spices
programme.desc: Nadiya calls on her simple spices once again to create deliciously easy dishes to whip up with barely any effort at all: a wickedly cheeky spin on a classic breakfast muffin.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgment by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: A rogue insurgent assassinates foreign journalists and makes it look like the CIA is responsible. Coaxed out of retirement to clear the agencys name, a deadly operative must confront his checkered past while unraveling an international conspiracy.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save his captive wife from King Leopolds devious envoy.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgment by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgment by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: A rogue insurgent assassinates foreign journalists and makes it look like the CIA is responsible. Coaxed out of retirement to clear the agencys name, a deadly operative must confront his checkered past while unraveling an international conspiracy.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save his captive wife from King Leopolds devious envoy.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: When the beast-themed Animilitia plague Gotham, Batman swings out to investigate. But with The Penguin and his cyber-animals added to the mix, Batman will need the help of Green Arrow and The Flash to bring them to heel.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs. Mutants
programme.desc: Gotham City faces catastrophe when Mr Freeze transforms Killer Croc and Bane into mega-sized mutant monsters. As the gigantic villains go on the rampage, its up to the caped crusader to cut them down to size.

programme.title: The Inventor
programme.desc: The insatiably curious Leonardo da Vinci leaves Italy to join the French court, where he can experiment freely, invent incredible machines and study the human body. He is joined on his adventure by the audacious French princess Marguerite de Nevarre.

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: Batman and Robin have their hands full when Penguin, The Joker, Riddler and Catwoman join forces.

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: Batman and Robin have their hands full when Penguin, The Joker, Riddler and Catwoman join forces.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he wont let her go that easily.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: A long-smouldering flame is rekindled when a once-popular opera star reunites with her ex-husband and fellow performers at a retirement home for musicians.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her M?ori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: For the tenacious 11-year-old Robin and her loyal band of friends The Hoods, the patch of overgrown scrubland at the end of their cul-de-sac is a magical kingdom.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens novel, `Oliver Twist, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her M?ori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her M?ori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: For the tenacious 11-year-old Robin and her loyal band of friends The Hoods, the patch of overgrown scrubland at the end of their cul-de-sac is a magical kingdom.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens novel, `Oliver Twist, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her M?ori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.
