programme.desc: An exuberant tale full of giant pumpkins, madcap characters and a little girl who just might be a pumpkin-growing savant. (2025, 107 mins)

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: The greatest love story of all time, set as an original pop musical. Based on the real story that inspired William Shakespeares Romeo and Juliet.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage as he fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Men In Black Films
programme.desc: It is time to protect the Earth from the scum of the universe as we walk through how to join the Men in Black, learning from agents Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, and more.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Its the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills arent paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Men In Black Films
programme.desc: It is time to protect the Earth from the scum of the universe as we walk through how to join the Men in Black, learning from agents Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, and more.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Its the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills arent paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Its the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills arent paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm `snuff films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.desc: When Dan gets injured while covering D.J.s vending machine route, the decision to sue the company could cost D.J. his job; Jackie is appalled when Becky seeks life coaching from her nemesis.

programme.desc: When Ben offers Mark free piano lessons, Darlene uses it as an opportunity to test his parenting skills; Jackie throws Becky a baby shower; Emilio continues his efforts to be part of the babys life.

programme.desc: After her first official date with Mr Big, Carrie wonders if he took her to a particular restaurant because he was ashamed of her. Her suspicions increase when he doesnt introduce her to his friends.

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: From the moment they take their precious first steps as babies, little ones face a great many difficulties and dangers across the animal kingdom as they strive to survive to adulthood.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Woolly monkey Piquita requires an operation, new capuchin Louis gets a lovely perch, while the chimp team find themselves trying to navigate a double blow after two sad losses.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison visits Twycross Zoo to collect an orphaned orangutan in need of a new home, plus there is some startling news about a capuchin recently rescued from a life in the pet trade.

programme.title: Rooted
programme.desc: This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years - that can withstand the harshest conditions - and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any other - the enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry From the Mist
programme.desc: Biologists race against the clock as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlocks the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponders whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack.

programme.title: A Bees Diary
programme.desc: Bees are one of the most important species on the planet. Follow the trials and tribulations of two particular honeybees over two years from birth to death.

programme.title: Shark Squad
programme.desc: In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators - before its too late.

programme.title: Shark Squad
programme.desc: In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours and fight for the protection of these supreme predators before it is too late.

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Discover the most fantastic city of them all lying beneath the waves, where romance and migratory commuters flood the coral reefs main highways. Follow a green sea turtle looking for love and sit in with a cassowary dad tending his newborn chicks.

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Feel the heat of summers arrival as supersize sea snails try to fend off an invading gang of coral-hungry starfish. Accompany reef sharks as they prowl for a midnight meal and marvel at the slippery disguise a parrotfish uses to survive the night.

programme.title: Supersenses
programme.desc: Eyes are so vital theyve evolved independently almost one hundred times, from the incredibly simple to the bafflingly complex. Whether an animal has just two or hundreds of eyes, theyre adapted perfectly for its particular suite of needs.

programme.title: Supersenses
programme.desc: Discorver why and how some of the worlds most amazing animals use their special powers to survive in a diverse range of environments, and how they push the limits of engineering to achieve incredible feats that humans can only dream of.

programme.title: Supersenses
programme.desc: Compared to some animals, human senses are sorely limited. Beyond our scope of perception, there is an invisible world that humans know little about, but that some animals rely on in order to survive.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Right beneath our feet is a secret world of disguise and espionage, social networking and courtship, rape and pillage, parenthood and relationships. Sir David Attenborough investigates how macroscopic residents outwit their enemies to survive.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Its a bug-eating world out there, and the documentary continues with a look at how the various critters disable the defences of their respective prey.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Dating is just as tricky a business in the insect world, and Sir David Attenborough finds out how certain bugs choose and then woo their partners.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough reveals how different bugs usher in the next generation, including the butterfly and harvestman spider.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Join Sir David Attenborough as he zooms in on a set of bugs who prefer co-operation to conflict. Features the likes of the burrowing cockroach and the queen bee.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough takes a tour of the insect worlds vast colonies, which rival human megacities in terms of size and complexity.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: From turf wars, to food fights, to mating mayhem, nature is all about competition and the quest to be the best. Every day, the planet is a battleground as animals go head to head with their own kind.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon
programme.desc: Faced with little water and space, animals must learn new skills to survive the dry season. If they dont, theyll quickly become the vultures next feast.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World
programme.desc: The ruthless realm of some of the stealthiest and cleverest insects in the animal kingdom -- from praying mantises and aquatic insects to dragonflies.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World
programme.desc: The crucial ecological roles that beetles play in nearly every environment, and why they are often regarded "the most important species on the planet."

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: In June 2010, North Attleborough police are summoned to a brutal homicide scene. Minutes later, an impending thunderstorm threatens to obliterate crucial evidence.

programme.desc: Before Rhonda and her boyfriend Stephen headed to the Columbia River Gorge, she joked to a friend that Nichols was either going to propose or kill me.

programme.desc: Bob Dorotiks body was found on a mountain road near his ranch. His wife told police that Bob had gone jogging and never returned, but investigators had their doubts.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Sheila Bryan was convicted of killing her own mother in a car fire, and sentenced to life in prison. Uncover the story of her appeal for freedom.

programme.desc: When Shari Faye Smith was abducted by her murderer, her family received a letter hed forced her to write, entitled last will and testament. Could the police catch her killer?

programme.sub-title: Wild Pigs That Bite?!; Sinking Boat

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: A Mothers Revenge on Her Sons Ex?!; Homeless and Looking for Payback?!

programme.sub-title: Childcare Center Revenge?!; Mans Mani/Pedi Fail

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Abuse of the Justice System?; You Should Know Better by Now!
programme.desc: A man is accused of filing a retaliatory restraining order against a co-worker who loses his job because of his actions. A woman in her sixties leaves all of her belongings in free storage for seven months and expects payback when they go missing.

programme.title: Judge Judy

programme.title: Judge Judy

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo arrives in Manassas, scene of two crucial battles during the American Civil War. In Fredericksburg, Virginia, he tries his hand at bottling bourbon corn whiskey and learns how it became the nations spirit. In Richmond, a plate of ham and eggs with southern grits sets Michael up for a tour of the Virginia state Capitol building, where he learns about the terrible dilemma faced by one of its most famous sons, General Robert E Lee.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.sub-title: St Louis to Jefferson City, Missouri
programme.desc: Michael begins this leg at the birthplace of a rural icon in Washington, Missouri, where he attempts to craft a corn cob pipe. In Hermann, Missouri, he tucks in to Bratwurst as he discovers the descendants of German settlers.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A return visit to Audley End in Essex sees Fiona Bruce and the team of experts meeting thousands of visitors who are bringing family treasures for appraisal. Amongst objects brought to camera are a table that was supposedly used to sign Napoleons abdication, and a giant bronze cockerel buried in both world wars to avoid being melted down for ammunition.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team of experts make a return visit to Hanbury Hall near Droitwich in Worcestershire, where it seems that extraordinarily large objects are the talking point of the day. Expert Adam Schoon appraises an enormous fishing rod, created by a man whose obsession for fishing saw him send prize specimens back home from the western front in World War One.
